pages.title: Awakening
pages.description: Awakens nearby Archwood trees into Weald Walkers and Budding Amethyst into Amethyst Golems. Weald Walkers can be given a position in the world to guard against hostile mobs. They will heal over time, and turn into Weald Waddlers if they die. To create a Weald Walker, perform this ritual near the base of an Archwood Tree. Augmenting with Book and Quills will create Bookwyrm Charms.
